page.title: 15HOBBIES IN HOPTON
page.content: The people of Hopton like to have a hobby to occupy some of their spare time. The most popular hobbies for ladies are knitting jumpers, scarves, socks and baby clothes; walking or horse riding in the countryside; reading magazines and books; watching television; doing jigsaw puzzles; sewing clothes and tapestries; drawing and going to play Bingo in nearby villages. Some people try to spend time each day on their hobbies while others have to wait for "a rainy day". Others prefer to collect stamps or shells or wild flowers for pressing. Men often have less time to pursue hobbies, but their interests lie in visiting local pubs, watching sport on television or gardening especially vegetables for their own families. Some find time to play cricket in the summertime at the local village club.
